entities.name: uncle vernon
entities.description: Uncle Vernon is mentioned as the one who changed the subject abruptly and seemed worried about Harry forgetting their bargain.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who caught himself thinking longingly of life without Aunt Marge and was happy to stay out of Uncle Vernon's way.

entities.name: aunt marge
entities.description: Aunt Marge is introduced as a new character who wants Harry under her eye at all times and delights in comparing him with Dudley.

entities.name: dudley
entities.description: Dudley is mentioned as the one whom Aunt Marge compares Harry to and buys expensive presents for.
